price: 86. En vergeef mijn vader, waarlijk hij behoort tot degenen die dwalend zijn;
arabic: وَٱغۡفِرۡ لِأَبِيٓ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ مِنَ ٱلضَّآلِّينَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: wa-igh'fir li-abī innahu kāna mina al-ḍālīna
